name: Sunrise Sanctuary
description: A fried egg, three strips of bacon, toast, salad and our soup of the day. Everything you need to get your day cooking
alt: A large plate with a fried egg, bacon, toast, salad and soup on it

name: Eggs-a-Plenty
description: Three fried eggs and three strips of bacon. Served with avacado and our signature bread, baked in house daily
alt: A plate with three fried eggs, three strips of bacon and a slice of bread on it

name: Stuffed Cereal
description: Cornflakes topped with banana slices, blueberries and walnuts
alt: A bowl of cereal on a table with banana slices, blueberries, walnuts and a spoon next to it

name: Perfect Parfait
description: Our signature fruit yogurt and granola parfaits. Filled with strawberries, raspberries, granola clusters and yogurt
alt: Three tall glasses filled with fruit and yogurt parfaits

name: Scrumptious Breakfast Sandwich
description: A fried egg, bacon, cheese, lettuce and tomato on a english muffin. Yum!
alt: An english muffin sandwich on a plate

name: The Full Stack Loaded Pancakes
description: Seven fluffy pancakes topped with mixed fruit and our special carmel syrup. Served with whipped cream
alt: A stack of pancakes on a plate, covered in syrup with a small cup of whipped cream next to it

name: The Whole Farm Breakfast Burger
description: An all-american burger topped a fried egg, bacon, canadian bacon and veggies. Cow goes moo, pig goes oink, chicken goes cluck
alt: A burger with a large pile of toppings leaning over on a plate

name: Wicked Waffles
description: Four fresh waffles covered in chopped strawberries and served with delicious syrup
alt: A stack of waffles on a plate, topped with strawberries with a small cup of syrup next to it

name: The Peach Treat
description: Peaches, blueberries, pistachios and cream cheese served on our fresh baked bread
alt: Two slices of bread covered in cream cheese, topped with large sections of peach on a plate

name: The Classic
description: Two fried eggs cooked to preference, with three slices of crispy bacon, rustic hashbrowns, a sausage link and toast. Served with ketchup
alt: Fried eggs, bacon, sausage, hashbrowns and toast on a plate

name: Outlandish Oatmeal
description: Hearty oatmeal topped with fresh blueberries
alt: An outstretched hand holding a bowl filled with oatmeal
